en.title: Respond to a divorce
en.name: Name
en.readApplication: You need to read the divorce application before you respond. You can find a copy in the letter that was sent to you, and a digital version with guidance on what each section means on the next screen.
en.responseAcknowledgement: Your response is legally known as the 'acknowledgement of service'.
en.respond7Days: You must respond to the application within 7 days. If you don’t, the divorce may move forwards without you.
en.namedCorespondent: As you have been named as a co-respondent in the divorce, the applicant is allowed to claim the costs of the divorce from you. This could include the £{{ feesIssueApplication }} application fee, and their legal fees and expenses. If you don't respond, you won't have a say in whether or not you pay these costs.
en.divorceCenterHours: Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm, Saturday 8am to 2pm

cy.title: Ymateb i ysgariad
cy.name: Enw
cy.readAmendedApp: Darllen y cais diwygiedig am ysgariad
cy.readApplication: Mae angen ichi ddarllen y cais am ysgariad cyn ichi ymateb. Gellir gweld copi yn y llythyr a anfonwyd atoch, a fersiwn ddigidol gydag eglurhad ar bob adran ar y sgrîn nesaf.
cy.responseAcknowledgement: Yn iaith y gyfraith, gelwir yr ymateb yn ‘gydnabyddiad cyflwyno’.
cy.respond7Days: Rhaid ichi ymateb i’r cais o fewn 7 diwrnod. Os na wnewch hynny, gall yr ysgariad fynd yn ei flaen heboch.
cy.namedCorespondent: Gan eich bod wedi cael eich enwi fel y cyd-atebydd yn yr ysgariad, caniateir i'r ceisydd hawlio costau'r ysgariad gennych. Gallai hyn gynnwys tâl o £ {{ feesIssueApplication }} am wneud y cais, a'i ffioedd cyfreithiol a'i dreuliau/threuliau. Os na fyddwch yn ymateb, ni fydd gennych ddewis ond talu'r costau hyn.
